# Call Volume

##All Call Volume
```{r callvolume, echo = F}

kable(t1.f, "latex", booktabs = T, row.names = F) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "2014" = 2,"2015" = 2,"2016" = 2,"2017" = 2, "2018"=2))%>%
  kable_styling(position = "center")%>%
  row_spec(seq(1,nrow(t1.f),2), background = 'light-gray')%>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE)
```
